controller.timer

Interface IGameTimer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountdownTimer, GameTimer, SpeedDemonTimer, TraditionalTimer

    public interface IGameTimer
    IGameTimer defines the interface required by MineFinderController for a timer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Proctor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
      Interface that allows the addition of an observer.
      int getMasterTime() 
      int getTime() 
      boolean isRunning() 
      void reset()
      Resets the time to it's initial value
      void start()
      Starts the timer
      void stop()
      Stops the timer.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        Interface that allows the addition of an observer. An IGameTimer must be Observable.
        Parameters:
        observer - Any Object who extends Observer

      • getTime

        int getTime()
        Returns:
        The current time of the game timer

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        True if the timer is currently running

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the timer

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the time to it's initial value

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the timer. Cancels all tasks.

      • getMasterTime

        int getMasterTime()
        Returns:
        The amount of time since the time started
